resources.string: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

News application is an app which show news source lists and articles of each source. You can see news sources, articles and article details. All of the news data(information) are powered by https://newsapi.org/ and thanks for free to developer and permit to develop open source projects. I hope this app may help you something else.

string.name: search_schedule_no_results
string.translation_description: Text that is shown if there are no search results

resources.string: Article content details are limited by newsapi.org.
